verses.text: Thy holy Sabbath, Lord, Thy people hail with joy; Come, bring us what to hear thy word, Let praise and love employ.
With sweet delight, the day That thou hast called your own, We hail, and all our homage pay To thee on sacred throne.
Oh! may thy saints be blest; Assist us while we pray; May we enjoy a holy rest, And keep the sacred day.
When Sabbaths here shall end, And from these courts we move, May we an endless Sabbath spend In heavenly courts above.
